name: Psionic Upgrade Package
description: A sadly required meta item, activate to unpack into materials to handle upgrading your psionic abilities.

name: Psionic Upgrade to Psicraft 2
description: A sadly required meta item, activate to unpack into materials to handle upgrading your psionic abilities.

name.str: So You Wanna Be a Psychic? Part 1
name.str_pl: copies of So You Wanna Be a Psychic? Part 1

description: Read this to train your psicraft up to level 2.

name: psychokinetic hammer
description: This is a metaphorical representation of your mastery of your psychokinetic powers.  You can use this as a real hammer to hammer things with your mind.  You wear it.

name: psychokinetic crowbar
description: This is a metaphorical representation of your mastery of your psychokinetic powers.  You can use this as a real crowbar to pry things with your mind.  You wear it.

name: psychokinetic wrench
description: This is a metaphorical representation of your mastery of your psychokinetic powers.  You can use this as a real wrench to... wrench things with your mind.  You wear it.
